body:
Comment 3 by **yangchunxu**: 
souce code: 

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	t := time.Now()
	fmt.Printf("first call: %v  2nd call: %v \n", t.Hour(),t.Hour())
	switch {
	case t.Hour() < 12:
	    fmt.Println("Good morning!")
	case t.Hour() < 17:
	    fmt.Println("Good afternoon.")
	default:
	    fmt.Println("Good evening.")
	}
}
run result:

D:\myGo>go install timeHour

D:\myGo>bin\timehour
first call: 2  2nd call: 10
Good morning!

D:\myGo>
